item.title: How to playback movies on this site
item.description: Download and install your favorite media player These are some recommedations VLC Media Player - multiplatform KMPlayer - multiplatform iina - macOS PotPlayer - Windows Media Player Classic (with K-Lite Codec pack) - Windows MX Player - Android … Copy the link and paste to the media player There are ways for each application for you to paste the URL down, for example VLC for Android: More –> New stream VLC for Windows: Media –> Open Network Stream… OR Ctrl + N MX Player: menu icon (top-left) –> Network Stream PotPlayer: Menu (top-left) –> Open –> Open URL… OR Ctrl + U … Notes: Subtitles are included in GitLab, RawGit links.

item.title: Lucifer
